command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE contentImports;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
contentImports	CREATE TABLE `contentImports` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `fileName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `fileType` enum('txt','docx','pdf') NOT NULL,
  `fileUrl` varchar(1000) NOT NULL,
  `fileKey` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `fileSize` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `extractedText` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tags` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `ragId` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin
